message.content: {"given_definition_quality":60,"better_definition":"to wear or put on (clothes)","sentence":"她穿衣服。","image_prompt":"A young woman stands in a simple room, calmly putting on a shirt. The scene is soft apocalypse animation style—washed out natural light, subtle decay visible (like cracked walls or dusty floor), a sense of calm and resilience. The focus is on the act of putting on the shirt, gentle and hopeful.","sentence_translation":"She puts on clothes."}
